string.text:
The "Knight" is modern Russian submachine gun designed for law enforcement and special forces, offering a high rate of fire and excellent reliability in close-quarters combat. Modeled after the AK platform, it features a lightweight, compact frame with a folding stock for better maneuverability. Its compatibility with suppressors and various tactical attachments makes it a versatile choice for urban operations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Kalashnikov Concern
